steps.description: Continue on the left lead, complete three circles to the left: the first two circles large and fast; the third circle small and slow. Stop at the center of the arena. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Complete a large fast circle to the left.
Complete a large fast circle to the left.
Complete a small slow circle to the left.
Stop at the center of the arena. Hesitate.

steps.description: Complete four spins to the left. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Complete four spins to the left.
Hesitate.

steps.description: Beginning on the right lead, complete three circles to the right: the first two circles large and fast; the third circle small and slow. Stop at the center of the arena. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Complete a large fast circle to the right.
Complete a large fast circle to the right.
Complete a small slow circle to the right.
Stop at the center of the arena. Hesitate.

steps.description: Complete four spins to the right. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Complete four spins to the right.
Hesitate.

steps.description: Beginning on the left lead, run a large fast circle to the left, change leads at the center of the arena, run a large fast circle to the right, and change leads at the center of the arena. (Figure 8)

primitives.description: Run a large fast circle to the left.
Change leads at the center of the arena.
Run a large fast circle to the right.
Change leads at the center of the arena.

steps.description: Continue around previous circle to the left but do not close this circle. Run up the right side of the arena past the center marker and do a right rollback at least twenty feet (six meters) from the wall or fence—no hesitation.

primitives.description: Continue around previous circle to the left but do not close this circle.
Run up the right side of the arena past the center marker.
Do a sliding stop.
Complete a half spin to the right with no hesitation.

steps.description: Continue around previous circle but do not close this circle. Run up the left side of the arena past the center marker and do a left rollback at least twenty feet (six meters) from the wall or fence—no hesitation.

primitives.description: Continue around previous circle but do not close this circle.
Run up the left side of the arena past the center marker.
Do a sliding stop.
Complete a half spin to the left with no hesitation.

steps.description: Continue back around previous circle but do not close this circle. Run up the right side of the arena past the center marker and do a sliding stop at least twenty feet (six meters) from the wall or fence. Back up at least ten feet (three meters). Hesitate to demonstrate completion of the pattern.

primitives.description: Continue back around previous circle but do not close this circle.
Run up the right side of the arena past the center marker.
Do a sliding stop at least twenty feet from the wall or fence.
Back up at least ten feet.
Hesitate to demonstrate completion of the pattern.
